content: work in 1x1 ribbing for 7 rounds k1 p1 on round 8 work stockinette k all while decreasing 8 sts evenly throughout using k2tog k2tog approx every 12 sts work 3 more rounds stockinette stitch k all 4 rounds k all in total bind off weave in all ends enjoy your cozy sweater posted for free only on ravelry ©copyright gia giaetcetra 2025 6 moss stitch chart a all charts created by me using stitch fiddle *note that this chart will be in between sections of moss stitch which are not fully charted here and can be adjusted to size knit on rs purl on ws purl on rs knit on ws slip 1 st onto cable needle and hold at back knit 2 from left needle knit 1 from cable needle slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at front knit 1 st from left needle knit 2 sts from cable needle slip 1 st onto cable needle and hold at back knit 2 sts from left needle purl 1 st from cable needle slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at front purl 1 st from left needle knit 2 from cable needle slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at front knit 2 from left needle knit 2 from cable needle slip 4 sts onto cable needle and hold at front knit 4 sts from left needle knit 4 sts from cable needle slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold at back knit 2 sts from left needle knit 2 sts from cable needle slip 4 sts onto cable needle and hold at back knit 4 sts from left needle knit 4 sts from cable needle slip 3 sts onto cable needle and hold at back knit 2 sts from left needle p1 k2 from cable needle slip 3 sts onto cable needle and hold at back knit 2 from left needle knit 3 from cable needle posted for free only on ravelry ©copyright gia giaetcetra 2025 7 chart b row 37 on chart a *see written pattern for more instruction on decreases and cable pattern sleeve kfb increase posted for free only on ravelry ©copyright gia giaetcetra 2025 8 chart c *row after 108 are only relevant if you are making the sleeve panel longer sample photo sleeves are bound off on row 108 posted for free only on ravelry
